testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Form Validation
testcase.name: should show error when no supplier is selected

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Form Validation
testcase.name: should disable submit button when no items are added

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Form Validation
testcase.name: should show error when no shops are configured

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Distribution Status Indicators
testcase.name: should show "Not distributed" status initially

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Distribution Status Indicators
testcase.name: should show "Partial distributed" status

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Distribution Status Indicators
testcase.name: should show "Fully distributed" status

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Distribution Status Indicators
testcase.name: should show "Over-distributed" status

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Validation Summary
testcase.name: should show validation error when items are not distributed

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Validation Summary
testcase.name: should show validation success when all items are distributed

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Submit Button State
testcase.name: should disable submit button when validation fails

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Submit Button State
testcase.name: should enable submit button when validation passes

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Submit Button State
testcase.name: should successfully submit when all validations pass

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Forms - Distribution Validation › Multiple Items Validation
testcase.name: should validate all items before allowing submission

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › validateDistributions
testcase.name: should return valid when all items are properly distributed

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › validateDistributions
testcase.name: should return invalid when no items exist

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › validateDistributions
testcase.name: should return invalid when no shops are configured

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › validateDistributions
testcase.name: should return invalid when item has no distribution

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › validateDistributions
testcase.name: should return invalid when distributed quantity is less than required

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › validateDistributions
testcase.name: should return invalid when distributed quantity exceeds required

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › validateDistributions
testcase.name: should handle missing distribution arrays gracefully

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › validateDistributions
testcase.name: should handle string quantities in distributions

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › validateDistributions
testcase.name: should handle invalid/NaN quantities in distributions

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › getItemDistributionStatus
testcase.name: should return "complete" when item is fully distributed

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › getItemDistributionStatus
testcase.name: should return "none" when item has no distribution

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › getItemDistributionStatus
testcase.name: should return "partial" when item is partially distributed

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › getItemDistributionStatus
testcase.name: should return "over" when item is over-distributed

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › getItemDistributionStatus
testcase.name: should return "none" when item index is invalid

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › getItemDistributionStatus
testcase.name: should handle missing distribution for item index

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › getItemDistributionStatus
testcase.name: should handle zero quantity items

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › Edge Cases
testcase.name: should handle empty arrays

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › Edge Cases
testcase.name: should handle null/undefined inputs gracefully

testcase.classname: Purchase Invoice Distribution Validation › Edge Cases
testcase.name: should handle items with missing productName
